Tweet Text: A 27-year-old German tourist named Berg Florian was robbed near Allama Iqbal International Airport, Lahore. Lahore Police confirmed this robbery incident.  Berg came to Pakistan by traveling on his bicycle. He was sleeping while camping on a road close to the airport when a condemnable robbery incident happened.
